name: rrvdmss
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), cuni(cdm(c0))))
-| wi(wceq(cdm(c1), cuni(cdm(c0))), wss(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c0))
⊣ (dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c0)→ ⋃ dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), cuni(cdm(c0))))
-| wi(wceq(cdm(c1), cuni(cdm(c0))), wss(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c0))
⊣ (dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c0)→ ⋃ dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), cuni(cdm(c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(crrv, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c0))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(rRndVar ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wceq(cdm(c1), cuni(cdm(c0))), wss(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(crrv, c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1))
⊣ (dom(c1)= ⋃ dom(c0)→ ⋃ dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(rRndVar ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cuni(cdm(c0)), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(crrv, c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ⋃ dom(c0)⊆ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(rRndVar ` c0))

comment: The domain of a random variable. This is useful to shorten proofs. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
